title: Bootstrap Flex Utilities
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Flexbox Power
Bootstrap exposes all CSS Flexbox powers as classes. These are usually used with `.d-flex`.

### Direction
`.flex-row`, `.flex-column`, `.flex-row-reverse`.

### Alignment (Main Axis)
`.justify-content-start`, `-center`, `-end`, `-between`, `-around`.

### Alignment (Cross Axis)
`.align-items-start`, `-center`, `-end`, `-stretch`.

examples.explanation: Flex column behaves like a vertical list.
